room_title: Escape room "Mr. Grey's Red Room of Pain" by Escape Vegas XXX in Las Vegas
room_address: 3247 S Sammy Davis Jr Dr Las Vegas, NV 89109
room_description: Amid an evening out on the town, your friends are interrupted by an urgent call from Anastasia. She begins to apologize for not being able to make it, but suddenly her voice goes quiet. You're not quite sure what's happening, but it sounds as if a struggle ensues, and all you hear is a faint "help me" before the call ends. You and your friends rush to Mr. Grey's estate, only to find Anastasia all tied up.  Free her before it's too late!
